summary: We testified that understanding pandemic origins can help policymakers craft responses to prevent future events. This could help reduce the high health and economic costs associated with pandemics. Genetic analysis and other technologies can help researchers detect a pandemic's origin. title: Pandemic Origins: Technologies, Challenges, and Policy Options to Support Investigations
